examples.example: 在规定的期限内，我们一定能出色地完成这项任务。

translate.english: Within the stipulated time limit, we can definitely accomplish this task excellently.

examples.example: 我们要在期限到来之前，全力以赴地做好准备工作。

translate.english: We should go all out to make good preparatory work before the deadline comes.

examples.example: 我们只要合理规划，就一定能在期限内达成目标。

translate.english: As long as we make reasonable plans, we will definitely be able to achieve the goal within the time limit.
